channel.title: NPC help
channel.description:
Hey l337 hax3rz. How do i make a bunch of npcs wander around a city?
If you know how, is there an easier way to make NPCs aggressive, the guide in the tutorial section isn't working...
And, how do i make an NPC poison a player and how do i make that poison hurt more or less?
Thanks in advance[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2008, 05:16:20 PM[/size][hr]BTW i'm using testscape if that has any relevance.
